Index.title: Stories of Guidance from Around the World
Index.whoAreNewMuslimsDescription: This section will provide an overview of new Muslims, their diverse backgrounds, and the common threads that lead them to Islam. It will highlight the beauty of their journeys and the peace they find.
Index.whatsNextDescription: If you are inspired by these stories and wish to learn more about Islam or connect with local Islamic communities, here are some resources.
Index.dailyStoryExcerpt: A brief excerpt from today's inspiring story.
Index.footerCopyright: Â© {year} Discover Islam. All Rights Reserved.

Hero.headline: Discover Inspiring Journeys
Hero.subheadline: Explore the stories of individuals embracing new beginnings, overcoming challenges, and creating positive change in their lives and communities.
